description: Try our easy to follow Soba Noodle Salad With Chilli & Peanut Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soba Noodle Salad With Chilli & Peanut Dressing
name: Soba Noodle Salad With Chilli & Peanut Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 180 g baby leaf salad with beetroot

recipeInstructions.text: Toss noodles with half the dressing in a bowl. Add salad leaves and cabbage and toss to combine. Serve with choy sum leaves, sesame seeds, cashews and remaining dressing
